name: Discotheque Inc.
description: Developer of a real-time feedback tool designed to boost appreciation at work. The company's subscription-based service integrates into tools people use at work (Slack, Microsoft Teams, and more) to celebrate when employees go above and beyond and enable managers to view detailed culture reports while spreading positivity at work.
one_liner: Developer of a real-time feedback tool designed to boost appreciation at work. The company's subscription-based service integrates into tools people use at work (Slack, Microsoft Teams, and more) to celebrate when employees go above and beyond and enable managers to view detailed culture reports while spreading positivity at work.
